rules.comment: Block domains that resolve to a Russian IP address.
Block domains that resolve to a Chinese IP address.
Block domains that resolve to an Indian IP address.
Block domains that resolve to a Nigerian IP address.
Block domains that resolve to a Vietnamize IP address.
Block domains that resolve to a Iranian IP address.

Block domains that resolve to a Indonesian IP address.
Block domains that resolve to a Saudi IP address.
Block domains that resolve to a Colombian IP address.
Block domains that resolve to a Ethiopian IP address.
Block domains that resolve to a Guatemalan IP address.
Block domains that resolve to a Honduran IP address.
Block domains that resolve to a Peruvian IP address.
Block domains that resolve to a Thai IP address.
Block domains that resolve to a North Korean IP address.
Block domains that resolve to a Ukrainian IP address.
Block domains that resolve to a Pakistani IP address.
Block domains that resolve to a Turkish IP address.
Block domains that resolve to a Yemen IP address.
